Cosmic Design.quote: He has created everything and determined it with precise determination. (Quran 25:2)

Universal Order.quote: The universe is written in mathematical language. (Galileo Galilei, The Assayer)

Divine Architecture.quote: The Lord by wisdom founded the earth; by understanding he established the heavens. (Proverbs 3:19)

Sacred Geometry.quote: God is the great geometer. All forms of nature are geometrically determined. (Plato, Timaeus)

Divine Plan.quote: In him we were also chosen, having been predestined according to the plan of him who works out everything. (Ephesians 1:11)

Cosmic Laws.quote: The Tao gave birth to One, One gave birth to Two, Two gave birth to Three, Three gave birth to all things. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 42)

Divine Pattern.quote: As above, so below; as below, so above. (Hermes Trismegistus, Emerald Tablet)

Creation Template.quote: Through wisdom is a house built; and by understanding it is established. (Proverbs 24:3)

Universal Mathematics.quote: Numbers are the highest degree of knowledge. It is knowledge itself that gives man all his being. (Pythagoras)

Divine Proportion.quote: The divine proportion is the mathematical law behind all things of beauty. (Leonardo da Vinci)

Cosmic Structure.quote: The whole universe is but one temple of the Supreme. (Swami Vivekananda)

Sacred Design.quote: Creation is the sacred geometry of nature. (Hildegard of Bingen)

Divine Framework.quote: He has set the earth on its foundations; it can never be moved. (Psalm 104:5)

Universal Harmony.quote: Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light. (Claude Debussy)

Divine Matrix.quote: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God. (John 1:1)

Cosmic Balance.quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself. (Rumi)

Divine Algorithm.quote: The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God. (Euclid)

Sacred Order.quote: God made everything with measure and number and weight. (Wisdom 11:20)

Divine Symmetry.quote: Symmetry is what we see at a glance. (Blaise Pascal)

Cosmic Template.quote: The universe shows us the face of God. (George Lemaitre)

Divine Encoding.quote: Nature uses only the longest threads to weave her patterns. (Richard Feynman)

Universal Principles.quote: The principles of nature are written in the language of mathematics. (Werner Heisenberg)

Divine Schema.quote: Everything in nature is made to fit and to harmonize. (Marcus Aurelius)

Cosmic Organization.quote: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts. (Aristotle)

Divine Orchestration.quote: The music of the spheres is the harmony of the cosmos. (Pythagoras)

Sacred Mathematics.quote: Mathematics is the language in which God has written the universe. (Galileo Galilei)

Divine Configuration.quote: The universe is not only queerer than we suppose, but queerer than we can suppose. (J.B.S. Haldane)

Cosmic Intelligence.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change. (Stephen Hawking)

Divine Implementation.quote: Nature is the art of God. (Dante Alighieri)

Universal Code.quote: The book of nature is written in the language of mathematics. (Galileo Galilei)
